m_szDocTitle: Top 10 Analyses From EU Energy Prices And Costs | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Top 10 Analyses From EU Energy Prices And Costs Originally published by EnergyPost by Sonja van Renssen Retail energy prices are rising dramatically across Europe even as wholesale prices and consumption are coming down. Taxes and levies – set by national governments – are the main culprit, says the European Commission. Energy Post offers a sneak preview of an analysis of energy prices and costs expected from the European Commission on 22nd January. The European Commission has nearly finalised its policy paper on energy prices and costs, plus an analysis of their drivers and implications. Belo
